name: Rollmancer
description:
Submission for GMTK 2022

Survive against waves of enemies as you use your magic dice to unleash chaos

Collect [essence] by killing enemies to unlock new dice from the shrines located around the map.

Hold RB to open the dice menu and use the right analogue stick to select a new dice once unlocked.

Have fun!

PS: I couldn't get mouse and keyboard support finished in time so unfortunately only gamepad control is supported for now!
